com.amazon.pages

Class KindleDetailsTab

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.base.BaseTest
      • com.amazon.pages.KindleDetailsTab

  • public class KindleDetailsTab
extends BaseTest
    KindleDetailsTab class is used to get all information related to Kindle edition of book including cost,pages,settings and supported devices
    Author:
    Kalyan Reddy Ogila
